text: Black Blocker, click to continue...
Motorway Background, click to continue...
6:44 P.M. \ Clear
Lungmen Ring Expressway, Car

name: Butler
text: Young Master?

name: Butler
text: Young Master, are you asleep?

name: Bison
text: Hm, oh... Where are we?

name: Butler
text: We will soon arrive at the rendezvous point. Do clear your head, Young Master. Penguin Logistics is already there waiting for you.

name: Bison
text: Mm. Right.

name: Butler
text: You seem exhausted.

name: Bison
text: I'm fine.

name: Butler
text: Forgive my indiscretion, Sir, but you do seem to have made this decision in some haste. You know of course that you may at any time share any matters that trouble you.

name: Bison
text: ...My father... he definitely has his own ideas.

name: Bison
text: But all I have to do is get Penguin Logistics on board. Then those guys won't be able to get between me and my father ever again.

name: Butler
text: You are the youngest Messenger in the history of your family, Young Master. You perform all of your duties impeccably. Surely that will be enough.

name: Bison
text: Maybe. But who knows if they'll feel the same way.

name: Butler
text: Young Master...

name: Bison
text: Looking out at the city, all I can think about is how almost all of Lungmen's Messenger firms belong to my father.

name: Bison
text: Penguin Logistics is the last. And the most independent. And the one with a ton of weird rumors swirling around it.

name: Bison
text: My father gets along pretty well with Mr. Emperor, but we have to do more to really get them. Or at least I do.

name: Butler
text: That is why I worry, Young Master. I am well aware Penguin Logistics is a most peculiar organization.

name: Bison
text: Don't look at me like that. I got this.

name: Butler
text: You might change your expression as well, Young Master. Perhaps if you smiled more, like the boys your age.

name: Butler
text: It's Sauin tonight. You could go out on the town with your friends.

name: Bison
text: ...real funny. Me not having friends is a joke to you, huh?

name: Butler
text: Heavens no! Perish the thought! Haha.

name: Butler
text: Dreadfully sorry, Young Master. Do you have your shield with you?

name: Bison
text: What's up?

name: Butler
text: I'm afraid we're being watched.

name: Gambino
text: Target sighted. You ready?

name: Mafioso
text: Gah, this fuse is still all...

name: Gambino
text: Just do it already.

name: Bison
text: Nng... an explosion?!

name: Butler
text: Hold on, Young Master!

name: Mafioso
text: Target sighted. He's still up.

name: Gambino
text: Bring him in. Quick.

name: Bison
text: (They bombed out the road...? But who...?)

name: Bison
text: (Shit... my vision's... all blurry...)

name: Gambino
text: Report.

name: Mafioso
text: Lots of witnesses, but I don't see the other targets.

name: Mafioso
text: Hold up, there's somebody in the smoke there!

name: Gambino
text: Another survivor? You gotta-

name: Mafioso
text: Nnng...

name: Gambino
text: Hey? Hey!

name: Gambino
text: You got whacked that easy?

name: Gambino
text: Talk about a hackneyed mob movie plot,

name: Gambino
text: Penguin Logistics.
Ooh, sounds like you passed Screenwriting 101.

name: Exusiai
text: But like, throwing up a roadblock on a suburban highway and burying a bomb on the side there. Isn't that also really cliche?

name: Gambino
text: Demolition's just a hobby of mine. Take a look around and I think you'll find things ain't so simple.

name: Capone
text: Damn. How much Originium did that mook use in his bomb? The Rat King'll have our balls for breakfast if he finds out.

name: Mafioso
text: We found a Penguin Logistics Messenger. It's Exusiai. Looks like she bumped off the wrecking crew...

name: Capone
text: Do I look blind to you? Where's the wolf? Texas?

name: Mafioso
text: Dunno. Don't see her.

name: Capone
text: Fuggedaboutit. Surround 'em. Let's get this done.

name: Exusiai
text: An ambush, huh? They're nothing if not thorough.

name: Exusiai
text: Hey, can you move? Your limbs are all shaky.

name: Bison
text: Yeah, kinda... You must be... Exusiai?

name: Exusiai
text: That's me! And you're... uh... Whatsisname!

name: Bison
text: Bison.

name: Bison
text: We... we should get out of here.

name: Exusiai
text: Before you get all mopey, that old butlery guy is a-okay.

name: Bison
text: Really?!

name: Exusiai
text: I put him by the roadside for a minute, but he doesn't look like he needs much help... anyway!

name: Capone
text: Exusiai, Messenger of Penguin Logistics, and the little rich kid there, give it up. Come with us nice and easy-like.

name: Exusiai
text: All these fresh faces, must be your relatives from Siracusa? Didn't you teach them how things work in Lungmen?

name: Capone
text: None of your damned business. We're cleaning you out for good this time.

name: Exusiai
text: Oh come on... You've been in Lungmen so long you turned basic. Grabbing territory like a common thug.

name: Exusiai
text: I guess at least some of the Siracusan Mafia can do more than just bar brawls.

name: Capone
text: Grr... I'll teach you to look down on a Sicilian. *Lungmen Swearing* Get 'em!

name: Croissant
text: Awright, looks like I'm right on time!

name: Exusiai
text: Croissant, you made it!

name: Croissant
text: But they're all so ornery. What're we gonna do?

name: Exusiai
text: The usual. You clear a path, I'll bring up the rear, we split the completion bonus.

name: Croissant
text: Now that's all ya had to say! Yeeehawww!

name: Mafioso
text: Th- that crazy broad charged right through!

name: Capone
text: ...get after them. But not too close. Wait for backup.

name: Mafioso
text: Got it!

name: Gambino
text: You lost 'em, cazzo.

name: Capone
text: Look, I ain't a kidnapping expert. The rest of Penguin Logistics never showed and we weren't about to go traipsing into downtown Lungmen by ourselves.

name: Gambino
text: I don't wanna hear excuses. There's a car headed your way. Convertible. Old friends inside.

name: Capone
text: ...already?

name: Exusiai
text: Gah, damn it. Another dead end?

name: Croissant
text: It's a buncha old ruins nobody's touched fer ages. Lemme just make my own hole already.

name: Bison
text: H- hold up! Where are we going?

name: Mafioso
text: There they are! It's a dead end! We got 'em!

name: Bison
text: It's game over, isn't it?

name: Exusiai
text: Oh yeah!

name: Bison
text: You have an idea?!

name: Exusiai
text: We haven't properly introduced ourselves, have we?

name: Mafioso
text: Rub 'em out!

name: Bison
text: Now's not the time for this! We've got more important things to deal with!
Nah.
This is important. Real important.
We got a serious emphasis on corporate culture. And today's culture buzzword is 'courtesy.'

name: Emperor
text: I just came up with it.

name: Mafioso
text: It's Emperor! Somebody call the boss!

name: Mafioso
text: There's someone else with him!

name: Texas
text: Came up empty, Exusiai.

name: Exusiai
text: Not every Siracusan mook's a total moron. We'll get 'em next time, don't worry.

name: Exusiai
text: But first, I've got to introduce you to Penguin Logistics's newest temp worker: Bison.

name: Mafioso
text: They blocked the only way out. We- we have to fight through!

name: Texas
text: Get down on the ground. You don't have to die.

name: Mafioso
text: Woah! Settle down, we just have to hold out until the boss...!

name: Emperor
text: Hold out?

name: Emperor
text: Hit the lights.

name: Mafioso
text: Agh! It's so bright! Where'd that spotlight come from?!

name: Emperor
text: Welcome to Penguin Logistics, little doggies.

name: Emperor
text: Now I can see you. And that means you're on land that belongs to the Penguin Empire.

name: Emperor
text: Now I hate to bother you, but I'm gonna have to see your landing visa. You got it on you?

name: Emperor
text: No?

name: Emperor
text: Then I think we gotta send you crying home to your mamas.
